name: Traffic Racer Highway Bike
description:
The extreme Traffic Racer Highway Bike is a marvelous highway drifting 3D game with advance simulation on the real asphalt racing tracks.

Get ready for the most thrilling 4x4 drift racing action while driving a real Traffic Racer Highway Bike simulator in extreme traffic rush. Experience the most realistic quad bike simulation while playing this dirt bike racing game on offroad muddy tracks.
The Traffic Racer Highway Bike mania game has many new and unique ATV bikes with ultra-high quality 3D graphics and four amazing terrains. Enjoy playing the trail bike racing in different astonishing environments and beat the rivals using your perfect drifting skills and bike parking techniques.
Avoid hurdles and obstacles while jumping over the ramps and perform some amazing acrobatic stunts to cross all the limits. Use the adrenaline filled nitro booster to bypass all the traffic riders and reach the finish line as soon as possible.

Download this top Traffic highway racing game for free and join the most adventurous desert death race rally free of cost.
